languages.text: "Я советовал бы готовиться к худшему. Культ может обитать на борту уже давно, в таком случае у них может быть своя небольшая армия. И речь не о человекоподобных инфильтраторах, а о сильных и быстрых тварях, чьи когти рвут металл как бумагу. Мутантах, обладающих психическими способностями и соединенных с единым разумом Выводка. Специализированных отродьях, элитных выведенных особях, занимающих высшие посты в генокульте. Враг многолик и опасен".

"I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."
languages.original_text: "Я советовал бы готовиться к худшему. Культ может обитать на борту уже давно, в таком случае у них может быть своя небольшая армия. Специализированных отродьях, элитных выведенных особях, занимающих высшие посты в генокульте. Враг многолик и опасен".

And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

languages.text: “我建议你做好最坏的打算，这支邪教很可能已经在这艘船上潜伏了很长时间。如果是这种情况，那它很可能已经拥有了一支小型军队。我指的并不是那些半人半虫的渗透者，而是邪教麾下那些强壮、敏捷的怪物，它们的利爪能像撕开纸张一样撕开金属。这些变种人经过了灵能调谐，与虫群的集体意识相连，而教派顶端的成员，则是拥有特殊能力的怪物与虫群精英。我们的敌人很危险，而且拥有各种各样的伪装。”
languages.original_text: "I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

traits.locale_text: “我建议你做好最坏的打算，这支邪教很可能已经在这艘船上潜伏了很长时间。如果是这种情况，那它很可能已经拥有了一支小型军队。我指的并不是那些半人半虫的渗透者，而是邪教麾下那些强壮、敏捷的怪物，它们的利爪能像撕开纸张一样撕开金属。这些变种人经过了灵能调谐，与虫群的集体意识相连，而教派顶端的成员，则是拥有特殊能力的怪物与虫群精英。我们的敌人很危险，而且拥有各种各样的伪装。”

languages.text: «Le recomiendo que se prepare para lo peor. El culto podría llevar mucho tiempo operando en la nave; de ser así, quizá disponga de un pequeño ejército. Y no hablo de infiltrados con aspecto parcialmente humano; este tipo de cultos controla monstruosidades fuertes y veloces, provistas de garras que rasgan el metal como si fuese papel. Mutantes vinculados en armonía psíquica a la mente colmena de la progenie. Abominaciones especializadas y especímenes de élite en la cúspide de la jerarquía del culto. Se trata de un enemigo peligroso que presenta múltiples facetas».
languages.original_text: "I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

traits.locale_text: «Le recomiendo que se prepare para lo peor. El culto podría llevar mucho tiempo operando en la nave; de ser así, quizá disponga de un pequeño ejército. Mutantes vinculados en armonía psíquica a la mente colmena de la progenie. Abominaciones especializadas y especímenes de élite en la cúspide de la jerarquía del culto. Se trata de un enemigo peligroso que presenta múltiples facetas».

languages.text: 「最悪の事態を考えておいてください。カルト教団は長い間この船で活動していた可能性があり、その場合、すでに小さな軍隊がいるかもしれません。半分人間のような外見をした浸透者（インフィルトレイター）ではなく、金属でもまるで紙のように切り裂いてしまうような、強力で素早い怪物の軍隊です。彼らは個体群の集合精神にリンクした精神同調変異体で、カルトのヒエラルキーの頂点に立つ特殊な醜態とエリート標本です。私達の敵は危険で、多くの顔を持っているということです」
languages.original_text: "I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

traits.locale_text: 「最悪の事態を考えておいてください。カルト教団は長い間この船で活動していた可能性があり、その場合、すでに小さな軍隊がいるかもしれません。半分人間のような外見をした浸透者（インフィルトレイター）ではなく、金属でもまるで紙のように切り裂いてしまうような、強力で素早い怪物の軍隊です。彼らは個体群の集合精神にリンクした精神同調変異体で、カルトのヒエラルキーの頂点に立つ特殊な醜態とエリート標本です。私達の敵は危険で、多くの顔を持っているということです」

languages.text: "Ich würde Euch raten, mit dem Schlimmsten zu rechnen. Der Kult ist möglicherweise schon seit sehr langer Zeit auf dem Schiff aktiv und könnte bereits eine kleine Armee aufgebaut haben. Und ich meine damit keine Infiltratoren mit halb-menschlichem Aussehen ... derartige Kulte befehligen starke und schnelle Monstrositäten, deren Klauen Metall durchtrennen, als wäre es Papier. Psychisch manipulierte Mutanten, die an den kollektiven Verstand der Rotte gekoppelt sind. Spezialisierte Abscheulichkeiten und Eliteexemplare an der Spitze der Hierarchie des Kultes. Der Feind ist gefährlich und hat viele Gesichter."
languages.original_text: "I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

Und ich meine damit keine Infiltratoren mit halb-menschlichem Aussehen ... derartige Kulte befehligen starke und schnelle Monstrositäten, deren Klauen Metall durchtrennen, als wäre es Papier. Der Feind ist gefährlich und hat viele Gesichter."

languages.text: « À votre place, je me préparerais au pire. Si ça se trouve, le culte sévit à bord depuis longtemps, auquel cas il dispose peut-être déjà d'une petite armée. Et je ne parle pas d'agents infiltrés à l'apparence semi-humaine... Les sectes de ce genre comptent dans leurs rangs des abominations dont les griffes peuvent déchiqueter le métal comme une vulgaire feuille de papier. Des mutants liés psychiquement à la conscience collective du couvain. Des monstres aux talents très spéciaux et des spécimens d'élite à la tête de leur hiérarchie. Autant dire que notre ennemi est dangereux et qu'il possède de nombreux visages. »
languages.original_text: "I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

Autant dire que notre ennemi est dangereux et qu'il possède de nombreux visages. »

languages.text: "En kötü senaryoya hazırlanmanı öneririm. Tarikat, gemide uzun zamandır faaliyette olabilir. Durum böyleyse hâlihazırda emrinde küçük çaplı bir ordu bile bulunabilir. Burada yarı insan görünümündeki casuslardan bahsetmiyorum. Bu tür tarikatların kontrolü altında pençeleriyle metali kâğıt gibi kesebilecek, güçlü ve hızlı yaratıklar vardır. Ruhsezi açısından uyum sağlayan mutantlar, Sürü'nün müşterek zihnine bağlanır. Belirli alanlarda uzman yaratıklar ve seçkin numuneler ise tarikat hiyerarşisinde zirvededir. Düşmanımız çok tehlikeli ve nice surete bürünmüş."
languages.original_text: "I would advise you to prepare for the worst. The cult could have been operating on the ship for a long time, in which case it might already have a small army at its disposal. And I am not talking about infiltrators with a semi-human appearance — such cults command strong, fast monstrosities whose claws tear through metal like paper. Psychically attuned mutants linked to the Brood's collective mind. Specialised abominations and elite specimens at the top of the cult's hierarchy. The enemy is dangerous and has many faces."

Düşmanımız çok tehlikeli ve nice surete bürünmüş."
